attributes.action: Introduce a Zero VAT rate on items manufactued from 95% recycled materials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request to introduce a zero vat rate on saleable items manufactued from a minimum of 95% recycled materials, to promote the complete re-use of as much waste as possible. The 5% concession is for packaging inks and components/ingredients to improve the quality of the items. This will make recycled items cost-comparible and act as an incentive on business to use and sell recycled items.
